text.name: sys_description
text.text: The PlayStation Portable (or PSP) is Sony's first portable video game console, marketed between 2004 and 2014. It incorporates a store to offer online dematerialized content, including games. This collection of 294 downloadable games is called PlayStation minis or PS minis. Many of them are also compatible with PlayStation 3 (PS3), PlayStation Vita (PS Vita) and PlayStation TV (PS TV). Some are ports of mobile phone games.
